name: Sanguine Modules
author: Bloodbat
description: A collection of modules based on Mutable Instruments Eurorack devices, their variants and the original Sanguine Monsters modules.

modules.name: Funes
modules.description: Powerful, polyphonic macro oscillator based on Mutable Instruments' Plaits 1.2

modules.name: Sanguine Mutants Blank
modules.description: Rack sleekerizer: add the Mutants goblin and a glowing Mutants logo to your rack!

modules.name: Apices
modules.description: Versatile complement to any patch, based on Mutable Instruments' Peaks

modules.name: Aleae
modules.description: Pair of polyphonic Bernoully gates based on Mutable Instruments' Branches

modules.name: Nodi
modules.description: Adaptable, polyphonic macro oscillator based on Mutable Instruments' Braids

modules.name: Contextus
modules.description: Multipurpose, polyphonic macro oscillator based on the Renaissance alternative firmware for Mutable Instruments' Braids

modules.name: Nebulae
modules.description: Texture synthesizer based on the Monsoon version of Mutable Instruments' Clouds

modules.name: Etesia
modules.description: Texture synthesizer based on the Parasite firmware for Mutable Instruments' Clouds

modules.name: Mortuus
modules.description: All-around gap filler based on the Dead Man's Catch firmware, with some additions, for Mutable Instruments' Peaks

modules.name: Fluctus
modules.description: Texture synthesizer based on the Kammerl Beat-Repeat firmware for Mutable Instruments' Clouds
modules.keywords: Clouds Beat-repeat Beat Repeat Monsoon beatrepeat

modules.name: Incurvationes
modules.description: Polyphonic meta modulator based on Mutable Instruments' Warps

modules.name: Distortiones
modules.description: Doctored, flexible and fully polyphonic meta-modulator based on the Parasite alternative firmware for Mutable Instruments' Warps

modules.name: Mutuus
modules.description: Experimental, polyphonic and multifaceted meta-modulator based on the Symbiote firmware for Mutable Instruments' Warps

modules.name: Explorator
modules.description: Polyphonic multiple, mixer, noise source, sample and hold, inverter, rectifier and logic unit, based on Mutable Instruments' Links and Kinks

modules.name: Marmora
modules.description: Random sampler based on Mutable Instruments' Marbles

modules.name: Anuli
modules.description: Polyphonic resonator based on Mutable Instruments' Rings
modules.keywords: Rings Modal Resonator Organ String Machine

modules.name: Velamina
modules.description: Tetrad of voltage controller amplifiers based on the revised Veils from Mutable Instruments

modules.name: Aestus
modules.description: Modulator based on Mutable Instruments' Tides

modules.name: Temulenti
modules.description: Multifaceted modulator based on the Parasite firmware for Mutable Instruments' Tides

modules.name: Vimina
modules.description: Polyphonic dual clock divider, multiplier and swinger based on the Twigs firmware for Mutable Instruments' Branches

modules.name: Nix
modules.description: Expander for Apices: adds CV modulation to function knobs

modules.name: Ansa
modules.description: Expander for Mortuus: adds CV modulation to function knobs
modules.keywords: Peaks CV Voltage Control Dead Man Catch Rainier

modules.name: Scalaria
modules.description: A polyphonic Moog inspired low-pass ladder filter from the original Symbiote firmware for Mutable Instruments' Warps

modules.name: Hydra
modules.description: 8 to 1 switch/sequencer that can avoid consecutive random repeated values; can be one shot, and can be reset to either no step value or the first step

modules.name: Gegenees
modules.description: 1 to 8 switch/sequencer that can avoid consecutive random repeated values; can be one shot, and can be reset to either no step value or the first step

modules.name: Sanguine Monsters Blank
modules.description: Put a vampire and the Monsters logo on your rack!

modules.name: Dolly-X
modules.description: Dual monophonic to polyphonic channel cloner.

modules.name: Oraculus
modules.description: n to 1 switch/sequencer that can select its output from a polyphonic cable input

modules.name: Raiju
modules.description: Flexible, fixed voltage source that can clone its output up to 16 channels and has one channel with a single copy of every selected voltage

modules.name: Sphinx
modules.description: Euclidean sequencer with different modes

modules.name: Brainz
modules.description: Master control center intended to make synchronizing audio and video files from different recorders easier

modules.name: Bukavac
modules.description: Noise generator with a plethora of colors... and Perlin

modules.name: Dungeon
modules.description: Sample and hold, track and hold, hold and track and white noise source with light up faceplate

modules.name: Kitsune
modules.description: Four polyphonic attenuverters, offsetters and inverters with user selectable smart input normalling.

modules.name: Oubliette
modules.description: Null sink and cable holder for input and output wires... doubles as a null voltage source

modules.name: Medusa
modules.description: Normalled, polyphonic smart mega multiple with 32 inputs and outputs

modules.name: Aion
modules.description: Four counters that can be advanced by triggers or their internal clock

modules.name: Werewolf
modules.description: Dirty stereo distortion

modules.name: Alchemist
modules.description: Mix up to 16 channels from a polyphonic cable to a single monophonic output or a mixed polyphonic cable

modules.name: Alembic
modules.description: Expander for Alchemist that provides gain CV control for every channel and individual post-fader channel outputs

modules.name: Denki
modules.description: Expander for Kitsune providing gain and offset CV control for every channel

modules.name: Chronos
modules.description: Four polyphonic low-frequency oscillators

modules.name: Fortuna
modules.description: Pair of polyphonic Bernoulli-like random signal routers with integrated crossfader

modules.name: Manus
modules.description: Expander for Gegeenes and Hydra that provides CV trigger step selection

modules.name: Crucible
modules.description: Expander for Alchemist: adds global and per channel CV and manual  Mute control; Mute exclusive mode; global and per channel CV and manual Solo control, and Solo exclusive mode
